data.title: Network Engineer II at DISH
data.meta_description: Find our Network Engineer II job description for DISH located in Littleton, CO,  as well as other career opportunities that the company is hiring for.
data.text:
CO Salary Range: USD 122,164.49 per year

Company Summary

DISH, an EchoStar Company, has been reimagining the future of connectivity for more than 40 years. Our business reach spans satellite television service, live-streaming and on-demand programming, smart home installation services, mobile plans and products, and now we are building America's First Smart Networkâ„¢.

Today, our brands include EchoStar, Hughes, DISH TV, Sling TV, Boost Infinite, Boost Mobile, DISH Wireless, OnTech and GenMobile.

Job Duties and Responsibilities

Network Engineer II sought by DISH Wireless LLC in Littleton, CO.

Support the deployment of 5G network routing infrastructure and the activation of a new network routing infrastructure. Provide technical training in network troubleshooting for BGP/MPLS/Segment Routing/EVPN/Dark-Fiber technologies. Communicate engineering problems and potential solutions while actively troubleshooting configuration or networking issues. Establish requirements and provide analysis for network and services specifications, network activation and acceptance. Provide technical expertise in the execution of network test, validation and integration plans on projects and the assurance of network integrity. Work with vendors to understand, test, and drive troubleshooting efforts.

Want more jobs like this?

Get Software Engineering jobs in Littleton, CO delivered to your inbox every week.

Send me The Muse newsletters for the best in career advice and job search tips.By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.

Job requirements:

Requires: Bachelor's degree (or foreign equivalent) in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electronics Engineering, or closely related field plus 1 years of relevant work experience in job offered or closely related. Also requires 1 year of experience with/using the following (which may have been gained concurrently):

IP routing (OSPF/ISIS/BGP)

Enterprise Ethernet Switching (Spine-Leaf)

Service Provider Networking Technologies (L3VPN/L2VPN/EVPN)

IP Addressing (CIDR/IPv4/IPv6)

Skills, Experience and Requirements

Employment is contingent on successful completion of a pre-employment criminal background check, which may include a drug test.

Rate of pay: $122,164.49

Benefits information available at careers.dish.com.

Apply at careers.dish.com. Ref: 2024-87782 if applying externally through careers.dish.com; Ref: 2024-87831 if applying internally. May also apply by emailing resume with (Ref: 2024-87782) to tasharedservices@dish.com. The posting will be active for a minimum of 3 days. The active posting will continue to extend by 3 days until the position is filled.
